name: Yunyan Li
main: Yunyan Li received her Master of Architecture degree at the University of Michigan’s Taubman College of Architecture and Urban Planning. She also holds a Bachelor of Engineering in Architecture from Xi’an Jiaotong-Liverpool University. She is interested in interdisciplinary research, computational design, and robotic fabrication, especially in how the collaborative fabrication methods of humans and robots can highlight design value and be implemented in teaching.
sub: At ADR, Yunyan will be contributing to research in digital fabrication, human-robot collaboration assembly, and XR, particularly in the study and analysis of XR-assisted construction with educational initiatives.
